@navi226 oh, I'll bore you about the liability problems post-gig at some point. And I have a paper on the topic if you'd like a copy ?!
@navi226 builders can appoint their own employees to inspect, and good luck with working out who's liable under the 'super duper' Regs!

From @cathmartingreen, calling for review into housing defects and law reform:
"Rebuilding Ireland - let's get it right this time"
...but disappointing that Government won't commit to review of causes of housing defects and law reform needed to provide remedies.
